price: (3) Perhaps, [O Muḥammad], you would kill yourself with grief that they will not be believers.
arabic: لَعَلَّكَ بَٰخِعٞ نَّفۡسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُواْ مُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: laʿallaka bākhiʿun nafsaka allā yakūnū mu'minīna
